sentences.sContent: I am not in favour of the Arsenal system.
sentences.sContent_eng: I am not in favour of the Arsenal system.
sentences.sCn: 我并不支持阿森纳的运营方式。

sentences.sContent: He often pamphleteers and lectures in favour of free trade.
sentences.sContent_eng: He often pamphleteers and lectures in favour of free trade.
sentences.sCn: 他经常讲演及写小册子支持自由贸易。

sentences.sContent: So today, we call upon the world leaders to change their strategic policies in favour of peace and prosperity.
sentences.sContent_eng: So today, we call upon the world leaders to change their strategic policies in favour of peace and prosperity.
sentences.sCn: 今天，我们呼吁世界各国领袖改变他们的政策方针以支持和平与繁荣。
